analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/46/0x37a2e0cdcc3dec87042dedfd32daca45d2089ecd.sol:
	Contract EthTranchePricing has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/46/0x37a2e0cdcc3dec87042dedfd32daca45d2089ecd.sol)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Crowdsale.getState (/unique_chucks/46/0x37a2e0cdcc3dec87042dedfd32daca45d2089ecd.sol#749-781) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp <= endsAt && ! isCrowdsaleFull() (/unique_chucks/46/0x37a2e0cdcc3dec87042dedfd32daca45d2089ecd.sol#770-780)
	- block.timestamp < startsAt (/unique_chucks/46/0x37a2e0cdcc3dec87042dedfd32daca45d2089ecd.sol#763-780)
